transcript: she we know what the word rabi means my Lord we make Dua by saying or rabi Nima but here in Bangladesh RAB is a common name among the boys even we have a neighbor named Rabbi and my brother always call him Rabbi this that so my question is is is this even permissible no it is not permissible at all to call someone Rabbi call him Ruby maybe that would be fine but definitely not rby as this is not permissible and Allah Knows Best
